reasoning: Acute myocarditis from viral etiology, reported incidence approximately 1-2 per 100k person-years based on epidemiological studies and cardiac registries. Viral myocarditis represents subset of all myocarditis cases.
source: Cooper LT et al. (2007). The role of endomyocardial biopsy in the management of cardiovascular disease. Eur Heart J. 28(19):2319-2333
